00017 struct Particle  //Particles
00018 {
00019         Vector3f position, direction;
00020         Vector4f color;

00022 };
00023 //--------------------------------------------------
00027 class ParticleSystem: public Object
00028 {
00029 private:
00030         int numberOfParticles;
00031         Particle *particles;
00032         Vector3f position;
00033         int fireTexture1;
00034         int fireTexture2;
00035         int smokeTexture;
00036         float rand1()
00037         {
00038                 return ((float)rand() / (float)RAND_MAX);
00039         }
00040         float randMinMax(float x, float y)
00041         {
00042                 return (rand1()*((y) - (x)) + (x));
00043         }
00044 
00045 public:
00051         ParticleSystem(Texture* tex, Vector3f pos);
00055         ~ParticleSystem();

00065         void update(float timeDifference);
00066 
00067 };
